articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: The Anthony Joshua vs Oleksandr Usyk rematch is just over two weeks away and a new promo video has dropped with a rare appearance from British boxing legend Prince Naseem Hamed.
articles.content:
The Anthony Joshua vs Oleksandr Usyk rematch is just over two weeks away and a new promotional video has dropped to get pulses racing for the unified heavyweight title showdown.

articles.author: Simon Jones
articles.title: Man United keen on Stuttgart's Sasa Kalajdzic and hold talks with RB Salzburg over Benjamin Sesko - Daily Mail
articles.description: The club have also spoken to Red Bull Salzburg regarding Slovenian wonderkid Benjamin Sesko but remain reluctant to hit the Austrian club's asking price of £55million.
articles.content:
Manchester United retain an interest in Stuttgart striker Sasa Kalajdzic as they look to strengthen their forward line.
